intro_dialogue: ^You arrived sooner than I expected. The cold always brings wandering souls to my door.
^Are you Mara? The villagers warned me about you.

c-0: ^No one comes here “by accident. The woods do not allow it.
c-1: ^They fear what they do not understand. One day, you will too.
c-2: ^Mara smiles faintly, as if your silence pleased her.
g-0: ^I can hear them… your sheep. Their wool carries the breath of life.
^But winter is approaching. And winter… takes.
^Not from you. From Her. *She points at something unseen.* Morana watches us. She demands the old ways be restored.

c-3: ^You already are. Every night you sleep, every time your sheep bleat in the shadows… That is Her whisper.
c-4: ^The effigy must be made. Straw, cloth, ribbon… and a mask. Only then will she accept the offering.
c-5: ^Silence is wise. Words can anger her.

g-1: ^Bring me the pieces. I will carve the face of the goddess. And together… we will drown death itself.
^Accept quest: I’ll find the items you need.
^Decline quest: I want nothing to do with this.

c-6: ^The old ways will thank you. Gather straw, cloth, ribbon… and the mask. When all is found, return to me.
c-7: ^Then winter will claim what it is owed. I will be here when you understand.

quest_declined_followup_dialogue: ^You return… yet without her gifts. Have you changed your mind?
^Accept quest: I’ll help you this time.

c-0: ^Good. Gather straw, cloth, ribbon, and the mask. Bring them to me when you are ready.
c-1: ^Then Her hunger will not wait forever. Go, while the frost still spares you.

quest_in_progress_dialogue: ^Have you found what I asked for?
^Then keep to the paths where the snow does not whisper. Bring the pieces soon… the air grows colder with each hour.
stage_002_dialogue: ^You have them… I can feel their weight before you even step inside.
^Well… well… the bones of winter are regaining their shape. The effigy is complete… and it is hungry.
^Now she sees you. She sees right through you.
^Blood for lines, breath for form… She is already walking beside us.

g-0: ^Go to the frozen altar, north of the village. Offer her what we have crafted. Burn her... or drown her. Winter will decide the rest..
^Then you will feed her with your flock… and your soul.

quest_completed_dialogue: ^Throw it into the water… let her wake.
^Then the frost will claim you… one breath at a time.
^The ice cracks loudly. A heavy silence falls.

c-0: ^I am the end that walks with every step of man.
^I am the silence in the snow.
^I am the dead dressed in winter’s veil.
c-1: ^You walk on my breath, shepherd. Where would you run?
g-0: ^Every step toward survival is also a step toward death. From now on, shepherd… you belong to me.

s0: ^The frost has quieted since your offering.
s1: ^ She watches through your eyes now.
s3: ^ Winter is patient, shepherd. Always patient.
